section.title: Editing Policy Event Assignments
section.para: The policy evaluates its scopes and conditions when specified events occur in your virtual infrastructure. This procedure enables you to select those events and the actions that should occur based on the evaluation of the scopes and conditions for the policy.

procedure.title: To Edit a Policy's Event Assignments

step.para: Click the Policies accordion and select the control policy you want to assign events to.
Check all the events you want to assign to this policy. For a description of the events, see .
